title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight self-hosted runner for Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma and other GGUF models with a built-in REST API and CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLM/Chat/Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, RAG, multi-user, plugins, model manager).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for browsing, downloading and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama supporting Kotlin, Scala, and Android.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with async streaming chat and embeddings support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and docker-compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app for chatting with Ollama models in channels or DMs, supports streaming replies.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama chat/embeddings views, admin integration, and async tasks via Celery.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template exposing Ollama endpoints with JWT auth, rate limiting, and OpenAPI docs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI-assisted note writing and summarization using Ollama models.
